name: World 2-1
description:
A simple platformer game, with a twist.  There is only 1 map for the whole game, and currently on V1.0 the game have 4 characters. Each have different move-set, stat, demerit, and can only access a specific area of the map.

Will receive update depend on if I have anymore character idea.
